Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the graphic by presenting it as genuine news when it was actually doctored.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting misleading information as factual.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it relies on a doctored graphic and inaccurate quote.

Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the existence of the doctored graphic.
